answers.answer: Im totally different this time. My first no symptoms hardly any weigh gain and barely showed... But now its my second and its been crazy.
Ugh girl tell me bout it. I heard second pregnancy the worst or the more kids you have. It just really weird how im not gaining weight.

With my first I was sick everyday from 8-14 weeks I had several uti's and I gained 49 pounds, with this pregnancy I got sick 3 times the whole pregnancy haven't had any complications and I'm having my csection tomorrow with a weight gain of 27 pounds this pregnancy was so much easier then my first

Lol Aww congrats and good luck. Have a safe delivery (: & yea w, my 1st I gained 50 pound and this one barely im only 15w5day so I still have a long way. And w, my so. I was sick alot as well w, a uti. And this one no symptoms lol.

Yea every pregnacy will be different...with my first I barely gained any weight and it was a really easy pregnancy til I got preeclampsia at 37 wks, my 2nd I gained like 30 lbs and had another easy pregnancy and delivery, and now I'm 23 wks with my 3rd and I've already gained 30 lbs lol and I had really bad morning sickness I get headaches every day and I'm just miserable...Im already ready for this to be over but I still have 17 wks to go and I know things will get way worse

My second pregnancy is way better than my first .. Had no pregnancy symptoms so far I'm 33weeks today but this pregnancy I'm anemic, everything else is great ..  My first boy was 9lbs 7oz 22inches maybe this one wont be that big

With both pregnancies I had morning sickness but with my first pregnancy I was sooo swollen and gained 55 lbs. and miserable. With this preg I have only gained 28 lbs and not swollen at all and its going pretty good. I have had other problems this pregnancy that have made me miserable but not preg related, its just being pregnant while going through them make it worse. Im 37 weeks and so ready for it to be over
Oh and my first son was 12.5 lbs and im hoping this one isn't that big lol, they are saying 8-9 lbs so we will see, that's what they said about my first one lol
Mine is totally different I gained 40 pounds with my first I'm 30 weeks and only gained 12 pounds so far

I gained about 80 pounds with my first. Horrible so depressed took a year to get it off and I smaller then before .my first pregnancy everyone kept saying your getting skinny. I'm like I know thank u. Fresh annoying. I almost gained 20 and I'm going on 21 weeks is that bad

my 2nd pregnancy was different too. a little more complicated, and I actually showed ! i'm on the bigger side, so I didn't think anyone would be able to tell I was pregnant. man was I wrong! everywhere I went someone asked how far along I was, what I was having etc. i'm not gonna lie, I was happy when they asked, because I didn't feel so fat lol

question: W  my son I gained alot of weight from my boobs, belly  butt and my thighs. And w, this one hardly. My belly small still at 4months and my son was bigger at this month. Lol. I kinda wanted my butt and thighs to get bigger /: lol I lost alot of weight due to depression thts why.
title: anybody else 2nd pregnancy different
